meanings.definition: The process in early embryonic development in which a blastula is transformed into a gastrula by the inward migration of cells.
meanings.sent1: During gastrulation, cells move inward to form a gastrula.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study gastrulation to understand how embryos develop.
meanings.sent3: The gastrulation party was a hit with all the cells migrating inward!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like cells during gastrulation, transforming her ideas.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of gastrulation lies in the intricate dance of cells shaping new life.
